subject: Emf Pumps or Wells
author: Michael
full_text: I have heard of a few groups using emf pumps or wells.   While doing some research I came across a very bad schematic of one, that the originator even admitted didn't work.   I was wondering if anybody had built one or even knew where I could get the drawings for one?   I thought about using a fan motor out of a small fan, but I want something with a little more control.  I'm almost thinking of using the motors and such from a microwave.   They would give off very high emf readings, just not sure how to do it...yet.   Thanks in advance!!!
